title: Electric power from shadows and indoors: solar cells under diffuse light conditions
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,700-716
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE00836C, Paper
Yeon Hyang Sim, Min Ju Yun, Luthfan Fauzan, Hyekyoung Choi, Dong Yoon Lee, Seung I. Cha
There is diffuse light in urban areas, so we need to utilize the angle of incident light for urban solar cells. In this paper, we propose a model to deal with complex diffuse light and predict the performance of solar cells in urban environments.
